content.text: is designed to process actual expenditure data for budget reports. It aggregates and inserts various types of expenditure data into the

table. The procedure handles different expenditure types, including total expenditures, tenant charges, Encore charges, refunds, and retroactive chargebacks. It also performs validation checks to ensure data integrity.

The procedure is complex due to its extensive use of conditional logic, multiple data sources, and numerous insert operations. It involves intricate calculations and validations, making it challenging to maintain and understand without a deep understanding of the underlying business logic and data structures.
: Represents the billing period for which the actual expenditure data is being processed.
: Represents the billing period that is published and used for reporting purposes.
: The procedure begins by determining the current budget and projection scenario type IDs from the
: Inserts total expenditure data for the specified billing period, excluding certain account groups temporarily.
: Validates that the total expenditure matches the sum of individual components.
: Adds tenant charge data to the total expenditure.
: Processes refunds and retroactive chargebacks, adding them to the total expenditure.
: Inserts data for other expenditure types, including tenant charges, NYPA energy, demand, and reactive power.
: Performs multiple validation checks to ensure that the total expenditure matches the sum of its components and that all accounts have necessary tariff codes and agency information.
: Handles specific cases for certain billing periods, inserting predefined values for refunds.
: The procedure processes large volumes of data, which can impact performance. Indexing on frequently queried columns can help improve performance.
: The use of multiple subqueries and joins can lead to performance bottlenecks. Optimizing these queries and ensuring efficient execution plans is crucial.
: The procedure does not explicitly manage transactions, which leads to partial updates in case of failure. Implementing transaction control can ensure data consistency.
: The procedure relies heavily on the integrity of the underlying data. Any discrepancies in the source data can lead to incorrect calculations and validations.
: The use of hardcoded values for special cases can lead to maintenance challenges and potential errors if not updated correctly.
for error handling, which may not provide sufficient context for debugging. Implementing more detailed error logging could improve troubleshooting.
: The procedure does not account for concurrent executions, which could lead to race conditions or data contention issues.
: As data volume grows, the procedure may face scalability challenges. Regular performance reviews and optimizations are necessary to ensure continued efficiency.

--************************************************************************************************************
		--* Name:				usp_Create_ActualExpenditureData_2_AddActualData
		--*
		--* Description:		this SP processes actual data for Budget Reports processing.  
		--*						ANY UPDATE MADE HERE SHOULD ALSO BE DONE IN THE the view where the same calculation exist as in this SP.
		--*						see uvw_TenantChargeActualExpenditureAllocationByBillingPeriod
		--*
		--* AUTHOR:				Derek Ho
		--* Created On:   
		--************************************************************************************************************
		--* Date		Tech	Description of Change
		--* ----------	---		-------------------------------------------------------------
		--* 2015-09-18	 ZD		Updated to get tenant charge scenerio type id from IsCurrentProjection
		--*						This change is requested by Stuart Barth
		--* 2016-01-13  MB-ZD	Changed the synonym name from [Budget].[CurrentFiscalYearBudget] to dbo.Syn_BudgetDB_Scenarios_BaseBudgetStagingByAgency
		--*						and [Budget].[TenantCharges] also with dbo.Syn_BudgetDB_Scenarios_TenantCharges
		--* 2016-06-03  MB		Added exception for 2.1 Insert record for "Total" expenditure
		--*						DEMBudgetGroup 63 was missing from 201603 and 201604 so Stuart asked us to exclude it from the totals so it doens't fail the validation 
		--*						this needs to be handled progrmatically in the future and we need to build safe guards against it 
		--************************************************************************************************************


CREATE PROCEDURE [Budget].[usp_Create_ActualExpenditureData_2_AddActualData]
	
	@BillingPeriod BillingPeriod,
	@PublishedBillingPeriod BillingPeriod
AS
BEGIN

	DECLARE @ScenarioTypeSeqId int
	
	SET @ScenarioTypeSeqId = ( SELECT   MAX(ScenarioTypeSeqid)
                                   FROM  dbo.Syn_BudgetDB_Budget_ScenarioType
                                   WHERE    IsCurrentBudget = 'Y'
                                 )

	
	DECLARE @ProjectionScenarioTypeSeqId INT
	SET @ProjectionScenarioTypeSeqId = ( SELECT   MAX(ScenarioTypeSeqid)
                                   FROM  dbo.Syn_BudgetDB_Budget_ScenarioType
                                   WHERE    IsCurrentProjection = 'Y'
                                 )
	/*
	2.1 total expenditure
	2.2 other expenditure type
	2.3 validation
	2.4 calculate for parent(s) in the expenditure type tree
	
	*/
	DECLARE @TotalExpenditureSeqID INT = 19
	
	DECLARE @ActualExpenditurePeriod BillingPeriod
	DECLARE @FiscalBeginning BillingPeriod
	SET @ActualExpenditurePeriod = @BillingPeriod
	SET @FiscalBeginning =  dbo.CreateFiscalYearPeriod(@BillingPeriod, 'S')
	
	-- 2.0 check if all accounts have tariff code
	IF(EXISTS(SELECT UtilityTariffRateInformationSeqid FROM Billing.Account
WHERE UtilityTariffRateInformationSeqid IS NULL))
	BEGIN		
		RAISERROR('There are accounts that do not have service classification code', 12, 1)
	END
	
	


	-- 2.1	Insert record for "Total" expenditure
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
			( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
			  BillingPeriod ,
			  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
			  AgencyCodeOEC,
			  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
			  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
			  CurrentMonthPaidAdjustment,
			  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
			  EnergyDeliveryType
			)
	SELECT    
		  @PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		  @TotalExpenditureSeqID, -- total
		  AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  SUM(actualData.ManualPaymentOverrideAmount) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  SUM(actualData.AccountEnergyUsage) AS currentMonthUsage,		  
		  SUM(actualData.PaidAdjustmentAmount) AS currentMonthPaidAdjustmentAmount, 	  
		  'Y',
		  null	  
	FROM EIAP.uvw_AgencyBillingPeriodActualExpenditureForAllEnergy AS actualData
	WHERE BillingPeriod = @ActualExpenditurePeriod
-- TEMPRORARY for 201603 and 201604
AND actualData.CurrentInvoiceAccountGroup <> 49 --AND actualData.BillingPeriod = '201607'
--AND actualData.BudgetGroupDEM <> '63' AND actualData.BillingPeriod = '201603'
	GROUP BY AgencyCodeOEC
	ORDER BY AgencyCodeOEC

	-- validate total 
	IF(
	(
		SELECT SUM(ManualPaymentOverrideAmount) ManualPaymentOverrideAmount
		FROM billing.AccountBilling
		INNER JOIN billing.Account
		 ON Billing.AccountBilling.AccountSeqid = Billing.Account.AccountSeqid
		 INNER JOIN Billing.UtilityTariffRateInformation AS utri ON utri.UtilityTariffRateInformationSeqid = Account.UtilityTariffRateInformationSeqid
		WHERE BillingPeriodRevision = @ActualExpenditurePeriod AND billing.account.AccountStatus <> 'EP'
		and Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriod = Billing.AccountBilling.LastPeriodModified
and Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBilling.LastPeriodModified
-- TEMPRORARY for 201603 and 201604
AND CurrentInvoiceAccountGroup <> 49 --AND BillingPeriod = '201607'
--AND utri.BudgetGroupDEM<>'63' AND BillingPeriod= '201603'
	) 
	<>
	(
		SELECT SUM(actualData.CurrentMonthActualDollars) FROM budget.		BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification AS actualData
	WHERE BillingPeriod = @ActualExpenditurePeriod)
	)
	BEGIN
		RAISERROR('Validate total $ amount fail', 12, 1)
	END
	
	IF(EXISTS(SELECT * FROM Billing.Account AS a
WHERE AgencyAccount IS NULL))
	BEGIN
		RAISERROR('Agency is missing for certain account record', 12, 1)

	END

	IF(EXISTS(SELECT ManualPaymentOverrideAmount, BudgetGroupDEM,  ManualPaymentOverrideAmount - (EnergyDollars + DemandDollars + FacilityPointDollars + PaidAdjustmentAmount + ReactivePowerDollars), *
	FROM
	[Budget].[uvw_NypaAgencyDivisionLevelBillingComponentAnalysis] AS actualData
	WHERE ABS(ManualPaymentOverrideAmount - (EnergyDollars + DemandDollars + FacilityPointDollars + PaidAdjustmentAmount +  ReactivePowerDollars) ) > 0.5
	AND BillingPeriod = @ActualExpenditurePeriod))
	BEGIN
		RAISERROR('validation NYPA view fail', 12, 1)
	end

	 --add tenant charge to agency total
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
	( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
	  BillingPeriod ,
	  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
	  AgencyCodeOEC,
	  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
	  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
	  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
	  EnergyDeliveryType
	)
	SELECT  
			@PublishedBillingPeriod ,
			  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
			  @TotalExpenditureSeqID, -- total
			  OECAgencyCode ,
			  
			SUM(actualData.tncManualPaymentOverrideAmount) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
			SUM(actualData.tncAccountEnergyUsage) AS currentMonthUsage,		  
			'Y',
			null 
	FROM Budget.uvw_TenantChargeActualExpenditureAllocationByBillingPeriod AS actualData
	where actualData.BillingPeriodRevision = @ActualExpenditurePeriod 
	GROUP BY OECAgencyCode 
	
	-- encore total
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
			( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
			  BillingPeriod ,
			  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
			  AgencyCodeOEC,
			  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
			  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
			  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
			  EnergyDeliveryType
			)
	SELECT    @PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		  @TotalExpenditureSeqID,
		  actualData.AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  SUM(actualData.EncoreAllocationCharge) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  0 AS currentMonthUsage,		  
		  'Y',
		  null		
	FROM Budget.uvw_EncoreActualExpenditureAllocationByBillingPeriod AS actualData
	where actualData.BillingPeriod = @ActualExpenditurePeriod 
	GROUP BY actualData.AgencyCodeOEC



	-- data ignored in published data will be included in the budget report as paid adjustment. This was added to handle 10 m refund.
	--INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
	--		( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
	--		  BillingPeriod ,
	--		  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
	--		  AgencyCodeOEC,
	--		  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
	--		  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
	--		  CurrentMonthPaidAdjustment,
	--		  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
	--		  EnergyDeliveryType
	--		)
	--SELECT
 --     @PublishedBillingPeriod ,
	--  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
	--  @TotalExpenditureSeqID, -- total
	--  AgencyCodeOEC ,
	--  SUM(billing.AccountBilling.ManualPaymentOverrideAmount) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
	--  0 AS currentMonthUsage,
	--  SUM(billing.AccountBilling.ManualPaymentOverrideAmount) AS currentMonthPaidAdjustmentAmount, 	  
	--  'Y',
	--  null	  
	--FROM billing.AccountBilling
	--INNER JOIN billing.Account
	--ON Billing.AccountBilling.AccountSeqid = Billing.Account.AccountSeqid
	--INNER JOIN Billing.AgencyDivision 
	--ON Billing.Account.AgencyAccount = Billing.AgencyDivision.AgencyDivisionSeqid
	--WHERE AccountBillingStatus = 'EP'
	--and Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriodRevision = @ActualExpenditurePeriod 
	--GROUP BY AgencyCodeOEC
	--ORDER BY AgencyCodeOEC
	
	-- add refund to the total
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
			( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
			  BillingPeriod ,
			  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
			  AgencyCodeOEC,
			  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
			  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
			  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
			  EnergyDeliveryType
			)
	SELECT    @PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		  @TotalExpenditureSeqID,
		  actualData.AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  SUM(actualData.AgencyRefundCheckAmount) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  0 AS currentMonthUsage,		  
		  'Y',
		  null		
	FROM CrisNationalGridWest.uvw_AgencyRefundCheckTotalAmount AS actualData
	where actualData.BillingPeriod = @ActualExpenditurePeriod 
	GROUP BY actualData.AgencyCodeOEC
	
	-- add retroactive charge back
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
			( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
			  BillingPeriod ,
			  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
			  AgencyCodeOEC,
			  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
			  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
			  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
			  EnergyDeliveryType
			)
	SELECT    
		  @PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		  @TotalExpenditureSeqID,
		  ad.AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  SUM(actualData.RetroactiveChargeBackAmount) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  0 AS currentMonthUsage,		  
		  'Y',
		  null		
	FROM [Billing].[AccountBillingRetroactiveChargeBack] AS actualData
	INNER JOIN Billing.AgencyDivision AS ad
	ON actualData.AgencyDivisionSeqID = ad.agencydivisionSeqID
	where actualData.PublishedBillingPeriod = @ActualExpenditurePeriod 
	GROUP BY ad.AgencyCodeOEC
	
	-- 2.2 	Insert record other expenditure type

	-- a. All except electricity, Encore and tenant charge
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
			( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
			  BillingPeriod ,
			  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
			  AgencyCodeOEC,
			  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
			  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
			  CurrentMonthPaidAdjustment,
			  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
			  EnergyDeliveryType
			)
	SELECT    @PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		  map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  SUM(actualData.ManualPaymentOverrideAmount) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  SUM(actualData.AccountEnergyUsage) AS currentMonthUsage,
		   SUM(actualData.PaidAdjustmentAmount) AS currentMonthPaidAdjustmentAmount, 	  
		  'Y',
		  actualData.EnergyDeliveryType		   
	FROM EIAP.uvw_AgencyBillingPeriodActualExpenditureForAllEnergy AS actualData
	INNER JOIN budget.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeMapBudgetGroup AS map
	ON actualData.EnergyDeliveryType = map.EnergyDeliveryType AND actualData.BudgetGroupDEM = map.BudgetGroupDEMSeqID
	WHERE map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID IN (15, 16, 17, 30) and actualData.BillingPeriodRevision = @ActualExpenditurePeriod 
	GROUP BY AgencyCodeOEC, map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID, actualData.EnergyDeliveryType	 
	ORDER BY AgencyCodeOEC
	
	
	
	-- b.1 tenant charge 
	
	-- b.1 tenant charge except NYPA electricity. NYPA tenant charge for electricity will need to get split into usage and demand	
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
			( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
			  BillingPeriod ,
			  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
			  AgencyCodeOEC,
			  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
			  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
			  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
			  EnergyDeliveryType
			)
		SELECT    @PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		  map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  OECAgencyCode ,
		  SUM(actualData.tncManualPaymentOverrideAmount) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  SUM(actualData.tncAccountEnergyUsage) AS currentMonthUsage,
		  'Y',
		  actualData.EnergyDeliveryType		
	FROM Budget.uvw_TenantChargeActualExpenditureAllocationByBillingPeriod AS actualData
	INNER JOIN budget.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeMapBudgetGroup AS map
	ON actualData.EnergyDeliveryType = map.EnergyDeliveryType AND actualData.BudgetGroupDEM = map.BudgetGroupDEMSeqID
	INNER JOIN budget.BudgetVersusExpenditureType expType
	ON map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID = expType.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqid		
	WHERE DataType = 'energy' AND expType.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqid NOT IN (1, 4, 9)
	and actualData.BillingPeriodRevision = @ActualExpenditurePeriod 
	GROUP BY map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID, actualData.OECAgencyCode, actualData.EnergyDeliveryType

	
	
	
	DECLARE @NYPATenant TABLE
	(
		AgencyCodeOEC AgencyCodeOEC,
		BillingPeriodRevision BillingPeriod,
		EnergyDollar MONEY,
		DemandDollar MONEY,
		PaidAdjustment MONEY,
		ReactivePowerDollar MONEY,
		EnergyUsage FLOAT,
		DemandUsage FLOAT,
		BudgetGroupDEM int
	)
	

---- Calculation here is also in uvw_TenantChargeActualExpenditureAllocationByBillingPeriod view
---- Any change done here in this calculation should be reflected in the view too
	INSERT INTO @NYPATenant
	        ( AgencyCodeOEC ,
	          BillingPeriodRevision ,
	          EnergyDollar ,
	          DemandDollar ,
	          PaidAdjustment ,
	          ReactivePowerDollar ,
	          EnergyUsage ,
	          DemandUsage,
	          BudgetGroupDEM
	        )
	SELECT 
		tenantPercentage.OECAgencyCode,
		BillingPeriodRevision,
		EnergyDollars * tenantPercentage.TenantChargePercentage,
        DemandDollars * tenantPercentage.TenantChargePercentage,
        PaidAdjustmentAmount * tenantPercentage.TenantChargePercentage,
        ReactivePowerDollars * tenantPercentage.TenantChargePercentage,
        AccountEnergyUsage * tenantPercentage.TenantChargePercentage,
        AccountDemandUsage * tenantPercentage.TenantChargePercentage,
        DCASData.BudgetGroupDEM 
 FROM [Budget].[uvw_NypaAgencyDivisionLevelBillingComponentAnalysis] AS DCASData
        INNER JOIN dbo.Syn_BudgetDB_Scenarios_TenantCharges tenantPercentage ON dcasdata.AgencyCodeOEC = tenantPercentage.DCASAgencyCode
 WHERE  BillingPeriod = @ActualExpenditurePeriod
        and tenantPercentage.ScenarioTypeSeqid =  @ProjectionScenarioTypeSeqId
	
	-- tenant NYPA energy
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
		( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  BillingPeriod ,
		  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  AgencyCodeOEC,
		  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
		  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
		  CurrentMonthPaidAdjustment,
		  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
		  EnergyDeliveryType
		)
	SELECT 
		  @PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		  map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  actualData.AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  SUM(actualData.EnergyDollar) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  SUM(actualData.EnergyUsage) AS currentMonthUsage,
		  0 AS currentMonthPaidAdjustmentAmount, 		  
		  'Y',
		  EnergyDeliveryType		
    FROM 
	@NYPATenant AS actualData
	INNER JOIN budget.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeMapBudgetGroup AS map
	ON actualData.BudgetGroupDEM = map.BudgetGroupDEMSeqID
	WHERE map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID IN (1, 4, 9)  -- nypa energy 
	GROUP BY actualData.AgencyCodeOEC, map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID, map.EnergyDeliveryType
	
	
	-- tenant NYPA demand
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
		( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  BillingPeriod ,
		  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  AgencyCodeOEC,
		  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
		  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
		  CurrentMonthPaidAdjustment,
		  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
		  EnergyDeliveryType
		)
	SELECT 
		@PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		   map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  actualData.AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  SUM(actualData.DemandDollar) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  SUM(actualData.DemandUsage) AS currentMonthUsage,
		  0 AS currentMonthPaidAdjustmentAmount, 		  
		  'Y',
		  EnergyDeliveryType		
  FROM 
	@NYPATenant AS actualData
	INNER JOIN budget.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeMapBudgetGroup AS map
	ON actualData.BudgetGroupDEM = map.BudgetGroupDEMSeqID
	WHERE map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID IN (2, 5, 10)  -- nypa demand 
	GROUP BY actualData.AgencyCodeOEC, map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID, map.EnergyDeliveryType
	
	
	-- tenant reactive power
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
		( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  BillingPeriod ,
		  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  AgencyCodeOEC,
		  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
		  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
		  CurrentMonthPaidAdjustment,
		  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
		  EnergyDeliveryType
		)
	SELECT 
		@PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		   map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  actualData.AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  SUM(actualData.ReactivePowerDollar) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  0 AS currentMonthUsage,
		  0 AS currentMonthPaidAdjustmentAmount, 		  
		  'Y',
		  EnergyDeliveryType		
	FROM 
	@NYPATenant AS actualData
	INNER JOIN budget.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeMapBudgetGroup AS map
	ON actualData.BudgetGroupDEM = map.BudgetGroupDEMSeqID
	WHERE map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID IN (3,6, 11)  -- reactive power
	GROUP BY actualData.AgencyCodeOEC, map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID, map.EnergyDeliveryType
	
	-- tenant paid adjustment
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
		( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  BillingPeriod ,
		  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  AgencyCodeOEC,
		  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
		  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
		  CurrentMonthPaidAdjustment,
		  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
		  EnergyDeliveryType
		)
	SELECT 
		@PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		   map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  actualData.AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  SUM(PaidAdjustment) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  0 AS currentMonthUsage,
		  SUM(PaidAdjustment) AS currentMonthPaidAdjustmentAmount, 		  
		  'Y',
		  EnergyDeliveryType		
  FROM 
	@NYPATenant AS actualData
	INNER JOIN budget.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeMapBudgetGroup AS map
	ON actualData.BudgetGroupDEM = map.BudgetGroupDEMSeqID
	WHERE map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID IN (27,28, 29)  -- paid adjustment
	GROUP BY actualData.AgencyCodeOEC, map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID, map.EnergyDeliveryType
	
	-- add tenant paid adjustment amount to total
	
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
		( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  BillingPeriod ,
		  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  AgencyCodeOEC,
		  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
		  CurrentMonthActualUsage,		  
		  CurrentMonthPaidAdjustment,
		  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData

		)
	SELECT 
		@PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		  19,
		  actualData.AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  0 AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  0 AS currentMonthUsage,
		  SUM(PaidAdjustment) AS currentMonthPaidAdjustmentAmount, 		  
		  'Y'
	FROM 
	@NYPATenant AS actualData
	GROUP BY actualData.AgencyCodeOEC
	

	PRINT 'Encore ....'
	-- c. encore 
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
			( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
			  BillingPeriod ,
			  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
			  AgencyCodeOEC,
			  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
			  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
			  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
			  EnergyDeliveryType
			)
	SELECT    @PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		  18,
		  actualData.AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  SUM(actualData.EncoreAllocationCharge) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  0 AS currentMonthUsage,
		  'Y',
		  EnergyDeliveryType		
	FROM Budget.uvw_EncoreActualExpenditureAllocationByBillingPeriod AS actualData
	where BillingPeriod = @ActualExpenditurePeriod
	GROUP BY actualData.AgencyCodeOEC, EnergyDeliveryType
	
	
	-- d. electricty energy
	
	-- nypa electricity
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
			( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
			  BillingPeriod ,
			  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
			  AgencyCodeOEC,
			  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
			  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
			  CurrentMonthPaidAdjustment,
			  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
			  EnergyDeliveryType
			)
	SELECT 
		@PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		   map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  actualData.AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  SUM(actualData.EnergyDollars) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  SUM(actualData.AccountEnergyUsage) AS currentMonthUsage,
		  0 AS currentMonthPaidAdjustmentAmount, 		  
		  'Y',
		  EnergyDeliveryType		
	FROM 
    [Budget].[uvw_NypaAgencyDivisionLevelBillingComponentAnalysis] AS actualData
	INNER JOIN budget.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeMapBudgetGroup AS map
	ON actualData.BudgetGroupDEM = map.BudgetGroupDEMSeqID
	WHERE map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID IN (1, 4, 9)  -- nypa energy 
	and actualData.BillingPeriodRevision = @ActualExpenditurePeriod
	GROUP BY actualData.AgencyCodeOEC, map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID, map.EnergyDeliveryType
	

	-- NYPA adjustment
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
			( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
			  BillingPeriod ,
			  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
			  AgencyCodeOEC,
			  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
			  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
			  CurrentMonthPaidAdjustment,
			  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
			  EnergyDeliveryType
			)
	SELECT 
		@PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		   map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  actualData.AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  SUM(actualData.PaidAdjustmentAmount) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  0 AS currentMonthUsage,
		  SUM(actualData.PaidAdjustmentAmount) AS currentMonthPaidAdjustmentAmount, 		  
		  'Y',
		  EnergyDeliveryType		
  FROM [Budget].[uvw_NypaAgencyDivisionLevelBillingComponentAnalysis] AS actualData
	INNER JOIN budget.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeMapBudgetGroup AS map
	ON actualData.BudgetGroupDEM = map.BudgetGroupDEMSeqID
	WHERE map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID IN (27, 28,29)  -- nypa adjustment 
	and actualData.BillingPeriodRevision = @ActualExpenditurePeriod
	GROUP BY actualData.AgencyCodeOEC, map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID, map.EnergyDeliveryType

	-- non-nypa elec energy
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
			( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
			  BillingPeriod ,
			  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
			  AgencyCodeOEC,
			  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
			  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
			  CurrentMonthPaidAdjustment,
			  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
			  EnergyDeliveryType
			)
	SELECT    @PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		  map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  SUM(actualData.ManualPaymentOverrideAmount) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  SUM(actualData.AccountEnergyUsage) AS currentMonthUsage,
		  SUM(actualData.PaidAdjustmentAmount) AS currentMonthPaidAdjustmentAmount, 	  
		  'Y',
		  actualData.EnergyDeliveryType		   
	FROM EIAP.uvw_AgencyBillingPeriodActualExpenditureForAllEnergy AS actualData
	INNER JOIN budget.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeMapBudgetGroup AS map
	ON actualData.EnergyDeliveryType = map.EnergyDeliveryType AND actualData.BudgetGroupDEM = map.BudgetGroupDEMSeqID
	WHERE map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID IN (23, 25) -- nonnypa elec energy 
	and BillingPeriodRevision = @ActualExpenditurePeriod
	GROUP BY AgencyCodeOEC, map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID, actualData.EnergyDeliveryType	 
	ORDER BY AgencyCodeOEC
	
	-- solar energy
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
			( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
			  BillingPeriod ,
			  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
			  AgencyCodeOEC,
			  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
			  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
			  CurrentMonthPaidAdjustment,
			  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
			  EnergyDeliveryType
			)
	SELECT    @PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		  map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  SUM(actualData.ManualPaymentOverrideAmount) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  SUM(actualData.AccountEnergyUsage) AS currentMonthUsage,
		  SUM(actualData.PaidAdjustmentAmount) AS currentMonthPaidAdjustmentAmount, 	  
		  'Y',
		  actualData.EnergyDeliveryType		   
	FROM EIAP.uvw_AgencyBillingPeriodActualExpenditureForAllEnergy AS actualData
	INNER JOIN budget.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeMapBudgetGroup AS map
	ON actualData.EnergyDeliveryType = map.EnergyDeliveryType AND actualData.BudgetGroupDEM = map.BudgetGroupDEMSeqID
	WHERE map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID IN (34) -- solar energy --used to be 33 -- updated zd 
	and BillingPeriodRevision = @ActualExpenditurePeriod
	GROUP BY AgencyCodeOEC, map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID, actualData.EnergyDeliveryType	 
	ORDER BY AgencyCodeOEC
			
	-- e. electricity demand
	
	-- nypa electricity demand
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
		( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  BillingPeriod ,
		  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  AgencyCodeOEC,
		  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
		  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
		  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
		  EnergyDeliveryType
		)
	SELECT 
		@PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		   map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  actualData.AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  SUM(actualData.DemandDollars) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  SUM(actualData.AccountDemandUsage) AS currentMonthUsage,
		  'Y',
		  EnergyDeliveryType	
  FROM [Budget].[uvw_NypaAgencyDivisionLevelBillingComponentAnalysis] AS actualData
	INNER JOIN budget.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeMapBudgetGroup AS map
	ON actualData.BudgetGroupDEM = map.BudgetGroupDEMSeqID
	WHERE map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID IN (2, 5, 10) -- demand 
	and BillingPeriodRevision = @ActualExpenditurePeriod
	GROUP BY actualData.AgencyCodeOEC, map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID, EnergyDeliveryType
	
	-- non-nypa elec demand
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
		( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  BillingPeriod ,
		  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  AgencyCodeOEC,
		  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
		  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
		  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
		  EnergyDeliveryType
		)
	SELECT    @PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		  map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  SUM(0) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  SUM(actualData.AccountDemandUsage) AS currentMonthUsage,
		  'Y',
		  actualData.EnergyDeliveryType		   
	FROM EIAP.uvw_AgencyBillingPeriodActualExpenditureForAllEnergy AS actualData
	INNER JOIN budget.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeMapBudgetGroup AS map
	ON actualData.EnergyDeliveryType = map.EnergyDeliveryType AND actualData.BudgetGroupDEM = map.BudgetGroupDEMSeqID
	WHERE map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID IN (24, 26) -- nonnypa elec energy demand
	and actualData.BillingPeriodRevision = @ActualExpenditurePeriod
	GROUP BY AgencyCodeOEC, map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID, actualData.EnergyDeliveryType	 
	ORDER BY AgencyCodeOEC
	
	-- solar demand
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
		( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  BillingPeriod ,
		  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  AgencyCodeOEC,
		  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
		  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
		  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
		  EnergyDeliveryType
		)
	SELECT    @PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		  map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  SUM(0) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  SUM(actualData.AccountDemandUsage) AS currentMonthUsage,
		  'Y',
		  actualData.EnergyDeliveryType		   
	FROM EIAP.uvw_AgencyBillingPeriodActualExpenditureForAllEnergy AS actualData
	INNER JOIN budget.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeMapBudgetGroup AS map
	ON actualData.EnergyDeliveryType = map.EnergyDeliveryType AND actualData.BudgetGroupDEM = map.BudgetGroupDEMSeqID
	WHERE map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID = 35 -- solar demand --used to be 34 updated zd
	and actualData.BillingPeriodRevision = @ActualExpenditurePeriod
	GROUP BY AgencyCodeOEC, map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID, actualData.EnergyDeliveryType	 
	ORDER BY AgencyCodeOEC

	-- refund
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
			( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
			  BillingPeriod ,
			  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
			  AgencyCodeOEC,
			  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
			  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
			  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
			  EnergyDeliveryType
			)
	SELECT    @PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		  31,
		  actualData.AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  SUM(actualData.AgencyRefundCheckAmount) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  0 AS currentMonthUsage,		  
		  'Y',
		  null		
	FROM CrisNationalGridWest.uvw_AgencyRefundCheckTotalAmount AS actualData
	where actualData.BillingPeriod = @ActualExpenditurePeriod 
	GROUP BY actualData.AgencyCodeOEC


	-- retroactive charge back
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
			( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
			  BillingPeriod ,
			  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
			  AgencyCodeOEC,
			  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
			  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
			  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
			  EnergyDeliveryType
			)
	SELECT    
		  @PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		  32,
		  ad.AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  SUM(actualData.RetroactiveChargeBackAmount) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  0 AS currentMonthUsage,		  
		  'Y',
		  null		
	FROM [Billing].[AccountBillingRetroactiveChargeBack] AS actualData
	INNER JOIN Billing.AgencyDivision AS ad
	ON actualData.AgencyDivisionSeqID = ad.agencydivisionSeqID
	where actualData.PublishedBillingPeriod = @ActualExpenditurePeriod 
	GROUP BY ad.AgencyCodeOEC
	
	-- g. NYPA electricity reactive power
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
		( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  BillingPeriod ,
		  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  AgencyCodeOEC,
		  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
		  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
		  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
		  EnergyDeliveryType
		)
		SELECT 
		@PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		   map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  actualData.AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  SUM(actualData.ReactivePowerDollars) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  SUM(actualData.AccountReactivePowerEnergy) AS currentMonthUsage,
		  'Y',
		  EnergyDeliveryType		
  FROM [Budget].[uvw_NypaAgencyDivisionLevelBillingComponentAnalysis] AS actualData
	INNER JOIN budget.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeMapBudgetGroup AS map
	ON actualData.BudgetGroupDEM = map.BudgetGroupDEMSeqID
	WHERE map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID IN (3, 6, 11) -- reactive power
	and  BillingPeriodRevision = @ActualExpenditurePeriod
	GROUP BY actualData.AgencyCodeOEC, map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID, EnergyDeliveryType
	
	
	-- NYPA facility point
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
		( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  BillingPeriod ,
		  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  AgencyCodeOEC,
		  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
		  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
		  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
		  EnergyDeliveryType
		)
		SELECT 
		@PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		   map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
		  actualData.AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  SUM(actualData.FacilityPointDollars) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  SUM(actualData.DeliveryStreetLightingFacilityPoints) AS currentMonthUsage,
		  'Y',
		  EnergyDeliveryType		
	FROM [Budget].[uvw_NypaAgencyDivisionLevelBillingComponentAnalysis] AS actualData
	INNER JOIN budget.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeMapBudgetGroup AS map
	ON actualData.BudgetGroupDEM = map.BudgetGroupDEMSeqID
	WHERE map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID IN (12) -- facility point 
	and BillingPeriodRevision = @ActualExpenditurePeriod
	GROUP BY actualData.AgencyCodeOEC, map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID, EnergyDeliveryType
	

	-- g. record ignored in 
	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
			( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
			  BillingPeriod ,
			  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
			  AgencyCodeOEC,
			  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
			  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
			  CurrentMonthPaidAdjustment,
			  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
			  EnergyDeliveryType
			)
		SELECT
		  @PublishedBillingPeriod ,
		  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
		  expType.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqid, -- total
		  AgencyCodeOEC ,
		  SUM(billing.AccountBilling.ManualPaymentOverrideAmount) AS currentMonthExpenditure, 
		  0 AS currentMonthUsage,
		  SUM(billing.AccountBilling.ManualPaymentOverrideAmount) AS currentMonthPaidAdjustmentAmount, 	  
		  'Y',
		  map.EnergyDeliveryType
	FROM billing.AccountBilling
	INNER JOIN billing.Account
	ON Billing.AccountBilling.AccountSeqid = Billing.Account.AccountSeqid
	INNER JOIN Billing.AgencyDivision 
	ON Billing.Account.AgencyAccount = Billing.AgencyDivision.AgencyDivisionSeqid
	INNER JOIN billing.UtilityTariffRateInformation
	ON billing.account.UtilityTariffRateInformationSeqid = Billing.UtilityTariffRateInformation.UtilityTariffRateInformationSeqid
	INNER JOIN budget.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeMapBudgetGroup AS map
	ON billing.UtilityTariffRateInformation.BudgetGroupDEM = map.BudgetGroupDEMSeqID
	INNER JOIN budget.BudgetVersusExpenditureType AS expType
	ON map.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID = expType.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqid
	WHERE AccountBillingStatus = 'EP' AND expType.DataType = 'adjustment'
	and BillingPeriodRevision = @ActualExpenditurePeriod
	GROUP BY AgencyCodeOEC, EXPType.BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqid, map.EnergyDeliveryType
	ORDER BY AgencyCodeOEC



	/**/

	 --handle special case refund for 
	 -- USE FOR THE SPESIFIC PERIOD AND COMMENT OUT AFTER GENERATING THE REPORTS
	if(@PublishedBillingPeriod  = '201510')
	BEGIN
		-- THIS BLOCK INSERTS THE INDIVIDUAL ITEMS NEXT BLOCK INSERTS THE AMOUNT FOR TOTALS
		INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
			( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
			  BillingPeriod ,
			  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
			  AgencyCodeOEC,
			  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
			  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
			  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
			  EnergyDeliveryType
			)
			values
			( 
				@PublishedBillingPeriod ,
				  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
				  31,
				  '040001' ,
				  '-29339.92', 
				  0 ,		  
				  'Y',
				  null		
			)
		

		INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
			( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
			  BillingPeriod ,
			  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
			  AgencyCodeOEC,
			  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
			  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
			  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
			  EnergyDeliveryType
			)
			values
			( 
				@PublishedBillingPeriod ,
				  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
				  @TotalExpenditureSeqID,
				  '040001' ,
				  '-29339.92', 
				  0 ,		  
				  'Y',
				  null		
			)

	END

	-- handle special case refund for

	--			  0 ,

	--			  null		
	--		)

	--		INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
	--		( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
	--		  BillingPeriod ,
	--		  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
	--		  AgencyCodeOEC,
	--		  CurrentMonthActualDollars,
	--		  CurrentMonthActualUsage,
	--		  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
	--		  EnergyDeliveryType
	--		)
	--		values
	--		(

	--	INSERT INTO budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
	--		( PublishedBillingPeriod ,
	--		  BillingPeriod ,
	--		  BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID,
	--		  AgencyCodeOEC,
	--		  CurrentMonthActualDollars,

	--		  IsSourceOfFundingGroupData,
	--		  EnergyDeliveryType
	--		)
	--		values
	--		( 
	--			@PublishedBillingPeriod ,
	--			  @ActualExpenditurePeriod ,
	--			  @TotalExpenditureSeqID,

	--			  null

	--END
  
    

	-- 2.3 validation
	IF(EXISTS(
		SELECT dataValidation.totalSum, dataValidation.otherExpSum, ABS(dataValidation.totalSum - dataValidation.otherExpSum) AS discrepancy, AgencyCodeOEC 
		FROM
		(
			SELECT 
			SUM(CASE WHEN BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID = 19 THEN CurrentMonthActualDollars ELSE 0 end) totalSum, 
			AgencyCodeOEC, 
			SUM(CASE WHEN BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID <> 19 AND BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID <> 8 AND BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID <> 20 AND BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID <> 14 then CurrentMonthActualDollars ELSE 0 end) otherExpSum

			FROM budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
			WHERE BillingPeriod = @billingPeriod AND PublishedBillingPeriod = @publishedBillingPeriod
			GROUP BY AgencyCodeOEC
		) dataValidation
		WHERE ABS(totalSum - otherExpSum) > 0.4
	))
	begin
		RAISERROR('Actual data validation failed', 12, 1)
	END
	
	IF(EXISTS(
		SELECT dataValidation.totalSum, dataValidation.otherExpSum, ABS(dataValidation.totalSum - dataValidation.otherExpSum) AS discrepancy, AgencyCodeOEC 
		FROM
		(
			SELECT 
			SUM(CASE WHEN BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID = 19 THEN CurrentMonthPaidAdjustment ELSE 0 end) totalSum, 
			AgencyCodeOEC, 
			SUM(CASE WHEN BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID <> 19 AND BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID <> 8 AND BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID <> 20 AND BudgetVersusExpenditureTypeSeqID <> 14 then CurrentMonthPaidAdjustment ELSE 0 end) otherExpSum

			FROM budget.BudgetVersusActualExpendituresByAgencyAndServiceClassification
			WHERE BillingPeriod = @billingPeriod AND PublishedBillingPeriod = @publishedBillingPeriod
			GROUP BY AgencyCodeOEC
		) dataValidation
		WHERE ABS(totalSum - otherExpSum) > 0.4
	))
	begin
		RAISERROR('Actual data paid adjustment validation failed', 12, 1)
	END

END
